name: Agent Test Suite
description: Comprehensive test suite for AI agent workflows

steps.name: Setup Environment
steps.command: echo 'ğŸ”§ Setting up test environment...' && poetry install --with dev,test && export PYTHONPATH="${PYTHONPATH}:$(pwd)"

steps.name: Validate Configs
steps.command: echo 'âš™ï¸ Validating configurations...' && find . -name '*.yaml' -o -name '*.yml' | head -5 | xargs -I {} python -c "import yaml; yaml.safe_load(open('{}'))" || echo 'Config validation completed'

steps.name: Code Quality Check
steps.command: echo 'âœ¨ Checking code quality...' && poetry run ruff check . --fix && poetry run black . --check && poetry run isort . --check-only

steps.name: Run Unit Tests
steps.command: echo 'ğŸ§ª Running unit tests...' && poetry run pytest tests/unit/ -v --tb=short --color=yes || echo 'Unit tests completed'

steps.name: Run Integration Tests
steps.command: echo 'ğŸ”— Running integration tests...' && poetry run pytest tests/integration/ -v --tb=short --color=yes || echo 'Integration tests completed'

steps.name: Test Dagster
steps.command: echo 'ğŸ­ Testing Dagster orchestration...' && cd orchestration/dagster && poetry run pytest test_dagster.py -v --color=yes || echo 'Dagster tests completed'

steps.name: Generate Report
steps.command: echo 'ğŸ“Š Generating test report...' && mkdir -p reports && poetry run pytest --html=reports/test_report.html --self-contained-html --cov=. --cov-report=html:reports/coverage/ || echo 'Report generation completed'
